#include <bits/stdc++.h>


using namespace std;

//----------------------------
//Returns a vector containing the zero based index of
//  the start of each match of the string K in S.
//  Matches may overlap
//----------------------------
char K[4000009];
vector<int> T(4000006, -1);

int main()
{
    int t;

    while(1){
        scanf("%s", K);
        if(strcmp(K,"End") == 0)
            break;
        int l = strlen(K);
        for(int i = 1; i <= l; i++)
        {
                int pos = T[i - 1];
                while(pos != -1 && K[pos] != K[i - 1]) pos = T[pos];
                T[i] = pos + 1;
                printf("%d ", pos +1 );
        }
        printf("\n");
    }

}
